headline: Saudi stocks slide over 2% as banks tumble; Aramco limits losses
summary: Investing.com -- Saudi Arabia’s benchmark index fell more than 2% in early trade on Sunday, weighed heavily by banking and materials stocks, even as energy heavyweight Saudi Aramco gained.

raw.headline: Saudi stocks slide over 2% as banks tumble; Aramco limits losses
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Saudi Arabia’s benchmark index fell more than 2% in early trade on Sunday, weighed heavily by banking and materials stocks, even as energy heavyweight Saudi Aramco gained.

headline: Oil, gas seen rising as Hormuz risks mount after U.S., Israel-Iran strikes
summary: Investing.com -- Escalating military action between the U.S., Israel and Iran is expected to push oil and gas prices higher, with analysts highlighting risks to shipping through the Strait of Hormuz.

raw.headline: Oil, gas seen rising as Hormuz risks mount after U.S., Israel-Iran strikes
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Escalating military action between the U.S., Israel and Iran is expected to push oil and gas prices higher, with analysts highlighting risks to shipping through the Strait of Hormuz.

headline: Japanese shipping giants pull back as Strait of Hormuz ’practically closes’
summary: Investing.com — Japanese carriers operating in the Middle East have shifted their operations from "high alert" to a total standstill. On Sunday, Japan’s largest shipping companies announced a formal suspension of operations in the Persian Gulf, citing the rapid military escalation following the death of Iran’s Supreme Leader.

raw.headline: Japanese shipping giants pull back as Strait of Hormuz ’practically closes’

headline: Colgate Palmolive (CL) Valuation Check After 2030 Plan Reveal And Analyst Rating Upgrade
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) is back in focus after rolling out its 2030 Strategic Plan. The roadmap is centered on brand strength, science driven product development, and sharper omnichannel execution that investors are watching closely. See our latest analysis for Colgate-Palmolive. The reveal of Colgate-Palmolive’s 2030 plan has arrived after a strong run in the shares, with a 30 day share price return of 9.8% and a 90 day share price return of 24.02% helping lift the stock to US$99.14.
